articles.description: DIRT 5 established itself as a fun, back-to-basics arcade racer on the PS4. With improved 4K60 visuals, ray tracing, haptic feedback and adaptive trigger use, is Codemasters' PS5 port the ultimate version of the game? Find out in our DIRT 5 PS5 review!
articles.content: DIRT 5 should be on any racing fans shortlist of games to play over the holidays (and beyond), as is evident in our PS4 review published earlier this year. But how does the game fare on the latest an… [+6485 chars]

articles.title: Is the iPhone 12 waterproof? We took it for a swim to test its water resistance - CNET
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 12 put up a good fight after being submerged in the chilly waters of Lake Tahoe.
articles.content: We know the iPhone 12 can handle spills and splashes, but Apple may be downplaying just how water-resistant this phone really is. The iPhone 12's IP68 rating means it can survive up to 19.6 feet (6 m… [+5264 chars]
